text:
[Verse]
Neon lights they burn so bright
City calls me in the night
Walking streets I'm feeling fine
Lost in rhythm lost in time

[Verse 2]
Heartbeat echoes in my soul
Dancing til I'm feeling whole
Stars above they shine so high
Underneath this endless sky

[Chorus]
Neon nights and flashing signs
Getting lost in endless lines
Heartbeats match the city's beat
Dancing in this neon heat

[Bridge]
Every step a memory
Captured in this melody
Life is short but nights are long
Neon lights they guide me strong

[Verse 3]
Whispers floating on the wind
Finding places I've not been
Colors blend and shadows fade
In this glowing masquerade

[Chorus]
Neon nights and flashing signs
Getting lost in endless lines
Heartbeats match the city's beat
Dancing in this neon heat
title: Neon Nights
